nodes.bodyText:
Better change it to joml's Vector3f. Make less FQN usages.
tera's Vector3f usages: 3
joml's Vector3f usages: 38
You can remove method assertEquals(Quat4f, Quat4f, float) - it is not used now (omega)

Oh, I don't noticed this migration junit4-junit5 T_T
Can you fix it? (change to import usage) Assertions.assertEquals
